MOD = 10**9+7
lst = [(1,0),(0,1),(2,1),(3,2)]
for t in range(int(input())):
 n = int(input())
 l = len(lst)
 while (n >= l):
  a = (lst[-1][0]+lst[-2][0]+lst[-3][0])%MOD
  b = (lst[-1][1]+lst[-2][1]+lst[-3][1])%MOD
  lst.append((a,b))
  l+=1
 print(lst[n][0],lst[n][1])

a=[]
mod=1000000007
a.append([])
a[0].append(0)
a[0].append(1)
a.append([])
a[1].append(2)
a[1].append(1)
a.append([])
a[2].append(3)
a[2].append(2)
for i in range(3,100001):
 a.append([])
 a[i].append((a[i-1][0]+a[i-2][0]+a[i-3][0])%mod)
 a[i].append((a[i-1][1]+a[i-2][1]+a[i-3][1])%mod)
t=eval(input())
while t:
 n=eval(input())
 print(a[n-1][0]%mod,a[n-1][1]%mod)
 t-=1

a=[]
a.append([])
a[0].append(0)
a[0].append(1)
a.append([])
a[1].append(2)
a[1].append(1)
a.append([])
a[2].append(3)
a[2].append(2)
for i in range(3,100001):
 a.append([])
 a[i].append((a[i-1][0]+a[i-2][0]+a[i-3][0])%1000000007)
 a[i].append((a[i-1][1]+a[i-2][1]+a[i-3][1])%1000000007)
t=eval(input())
while t:
 n=eval(input())
 print(a[n-1][0],a[n-1][1])
 t-=1

lim=100007
z=(10**9+7)
a=[0]*lim
a[2]=1
for i in range(3,lim):
 a[i]=a[i-1]+a[i-2]+a[i-3]
b=[0]*lim
b[1]=1
b[0]=1
for i in range(3,lim):
 b[i]=b[i-1]+b[i-2]+b[i-3]
 
for _ in range(0,int(input())):
 inp=int(input())
 print(b[inp+1]%z,a[inp+1]%z)

lim=1002
z=(10**9+7)
a=[0]*lim
a[2]=1
for i in range(3,lim):
 a[i]=a[i-1]+a[i-2]+a[i-3]
b=[0]*lim
b[1]=1
b[0]=1
for i in range(3,lim):
 b[i]=b[i-1]+b[i-2]+b[i-3]
 
for _ in range(0,int(input())):
 inp=int(input())
 print(b[inp+1]%z,a[inp+1]%z)
